Detailed Description

A virtual class for all our model transforms.

All the transforms (e.g. scale, rotate, etc.) that we define inherit from this superclass.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void modelTransform::apply (  matrix &    m )  [pure virtual]
 

Apply the transform to a matrix.

Parameters:
m  The matrix to apply the transform to

Implemented in modelTranslate3D, modelScale3D, modelRotate3Dx, modelRotate3Dy, modelRotate3Dz, modelAlignAxes3D, modelSheer3Dx, modelSheer3Dy, modelSheer3Dz, and modelMatrixReset.
